entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , St. Alban's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:38 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High 8.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to rain at times heavy this morning. Freezing rain inland this morning. Fog patches developing this morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm except 40 mm in areas of heaviest rain. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 this morning then becoming south 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low plus 2 except minus 2 inland.
entry.summary: Showers ending overnight then partly cloudy. Fog patches. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low plus 2 except minus 2 inland. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A few showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. A few showers beginning in the afternoon. Local amount 2 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
